question.text: What do you think about your friends right now?

answers.answer: I feel grateful for their companionship
I am concerned if they truly understand me
I feel distant and disconnected from them
I am bothered by recent conflicts

question.text: How do you feel now when thinking about something positive?

answers.answer: I smile as I recall something good
I feel uneasy thinking it might not last
I feel sad thinking about what I no longer have
I feel irritated for not having made the most of that moment

question.text: How would you describe your social interactions right now?

answers.answer: I enjoy being around people and living the moment
I feel anxious and try to avoid conversations
I feel distant and prefer to be alone
I feel irritated by others' behavior

question.text: What would you do if someone asked for your help right now?

answers.answer: I would help enthusiastically and willingly
I would feel insecure but try to do it
I would feel overwhelmed and try to avoid getting involved
I would feel annoyed and help reluctantly

question.text: How do you feel when thinking about your recent achievements?

answers.answer: I feel proud and happy with what I have achieved
I am worried about not having achieved more
I feel sad because I think I could have done better
I feel angry because my efforts are not being recognized

question.text: How would you describe your mood when you woke up this morning?

answers.answer: I felt energized and enthusiastic
I felt worried about the pending tasks
I felt demotivated and unmotivated
I felt irritated about facing the day

question.text: What do you think about the tasks you have to complete today?

answers.answer: I am excited to move forward with my projects
I am worried about not having enough time
I feel overwhelmed and unwilling to start
I feel annoyed about having so many responsibilities

question.text: How do you feel right now about your personal relationships?

answers.answer: I feel grateful for the important people in my life
I feel anxious about whether they truly understand me
I feel distant and disconnected from others
I feel frustrated with some recent interactions

question.text: What would you like to reflect on at the end of this day?

answers.answer: I want to feel satisfied with what I accomplished
I want to think about how to better manage my worries
I want to understand why I feel sad or melancholic
I want to analyze what upset me and how to fix it

question.text: What type of thought dominates your mind right now?

answers.answer: I feel grateful for the positive things I have
I am worried about how to face the challenges ahead
I feel nostalgic thinking about past times
I am annoyed thinking about the problems I haven't solved yet
